description: A CLI tool that creates deeply capable, well-trained Claude Code agents with AI-assisted writing, validation, testing, and MCP integration.

decisions.question: What type of tool to build?
decisions.answer: CLI tool for terminal use with Claude Max
decisions.reason: Works alongside Claude Code in terminal

decisions.question: What validation approach?
decisions.answer: Multi-layer: schema + quality + AI review + live testing

decisions.question: What training sources?
decisions.answer: Hybrid: pre-built templates + YouTube transcript extraction

decisions.question: What differentiates this tool?
decisions.answer: AI-assisted creation, playground testing, auto-improvement, context-aware suggestions
decisions.reason: State of the art without being confusing

assumptions.text: User has Anthropic API key for AI features
Skills will be stored in .claude/skills/ by default
